FuncDef:
The consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type command configures the M-LAG consistency check whitelist for the VLANIF module.
The undo consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type command cancels the M-LAG consistency check whitelist configured for the VLANIF module. The consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type command configures the M-LAG consistency check whitelist for the VLANIF module. The undo consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type command cancels the M-LAG consistency check whitelist configured for the VLANIF module. By default, the M-LAG consistency check whitelist is not configured for the VLANIF module.
CLIs: consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type { vlanif-configuration | ipv4-address | ipv6-address | vrrp4 | virtual-mac | vlanif-status | arp-timeout }
undo consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type { vlanif-configuration | ipv4-address | ipv6-address | vrrp4 | virtual-mac | vlanif-status | arp-timeout }
consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type { vlanif-configuration | ipv4-address | ipv6-address | vrrp4 | virtual-mac | vlanif-status | vlanif-bypass | arp-timeout }
undo consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type { vlanif-configuration | ipv4-address | ipv6-address | vrrp4 | virtual-mac | vlanif-status | vlanif-bypass | arp-timeout }
consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type { vlanif-configuration | ipv4-address | vrrp4 | virtual-mac | vlanif-status | arp-timeout }
undo consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type { vlanif-configuration | ipv4-address | vrrp4 | virtual-mac | vlanif-status | arp-timeout }

ParaDef.Info:
IPv4 address of a VLANIF interface.
-

IPv6 address of a VLANIF interface.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
-

IPv4 VRRP group configured on a VLANIF interface.
-

Virtual MAC address of a VLANIF interface.
-

Bypass tunnel configuration of a VLANIF interface.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
-

Sets the aging time of ARP entries on a VLANIF interface.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type vlanif-status
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type vlanif-bypass
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type vrrp4
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type ipv6-address
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type ipv4-address
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type vlanif-configuration
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type virtual-mac
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module vlanif service-type arp-timeout
